name: SPORTCON
description:
You got a magical ring and now able to control muscular jocks' minds freely❤

----------------------------------------

This is an indie visual-novel style bara porn game, made with Tyrano Script.
Simply choose variety of dialogues and places to go, and you can see multi-endings.

How to play
・Left Click/Enter　　→　　Resume Message
・Right Click/Space　　→　　Change Message Window Visible/Invisible
・Click Image　→　Choose the Place to Go

----------------------------------------

TIPS

・Each character has affection point, and it affects the choice of route in the latter part of the game.
・Affection point is added by choices in conversation, and also the order to choose places to go.
・The key is go to the place where the person you like is there first.
・Some early choices have long term effect to get CGs in the later of the game.
・Some scenes includes dark/extreme expressions.
・You can avoid the scat scene just by not choosing it.
